You wake up early that morning - its saturday and you are looking forward to having a fun weekend with no school. You climb out of bed, throw on some shorts and walk to the bathroom. As you get to the door you see Claire emerge, just finishing her morning wash, wearing a robe and white fluffy slippers. She doesn't look happy -and you know why. She has just finished being punished by Cathy: for answering back she spent Friday night as the insole of her mothers worn slipper. She looks angrily at you.
'I don't see how you always get off so lightly.' She says. 'If mom would let me I'd shrink you in an instant and keep you under my feet forever!' She then slammed a slippered foot down for emphasis, twisting it like grinding a bug. She then smiled. 'And you know it will happen one day.' She said and strode off. You smiled to yourself - she certainly was cranky this morning.

You finished in the bathroom and headed downstairs to the kitchen where Claire, Cathy, your step aunt Ann were all seated. Sarah and Julie must still be in bed and you have no idea where Carla, your step cousin was. Cathy has set some toast down for you and you sit down, tucking into it gratefully. Ann and Cathy are talking between themselves. You see Claire look to her mothers feet, encased in the white slippers she was an insole of last night. You see her shudder and force yourself not to smile. You notice that aunty Ann is wearing some old, brown sandals on her tanned feet.
She is telling Cathy about these thin soled sandals, which were once, many years ago, two young brothers who use to be her neighbours.
'But I've got a pebble stuck in the insole I just can't get out. It's too small for my fingers to grasp and its annotying me.' She says, grinding her toes into the strappy sandle.
'Why doesn't Tom get it out for you?' Claire chipped in, with a smile.
'I think his fingers would be too big too honey.' She replied.
'Well, why doesn't mom shrink him, then he can go in your sandal and get it out for you. I'm sure he would be glad to help.' She said, before turning to you with a grin.
'Oh, thats a great idea. Would you mind honey?' She asked you. 'My big sandals may smell a bit but I'm sure you could handle it.'
You feel your mouth go dry - you have never been shrunken before and you are scared of what could happen. Especially with Claire around. You look to your step mom Cathy.
'Mom?' You ask.

Within your mind you suddenly heard an annoying noise, almost like a radio wave...it was irritating, and soon downright nausiating. It was like being sick or something, you barely even registered that you were beneath Ann's sole like an insignificant bug. You closed your eyes and took a deep breath, not caring the slightest bit about the smell, you just wanted this sensation to end...and it did. Just after your eyes shut the annoying and overall painful feeling vanished almost without a trace, in its place was a weird feeling in your hands and feet, like something was...attached to them, you opened your eyes again to try and see what it was but your vision was blocked.

Directly before you, close enough that your entire body was up against it, was Ann's big toe. Every breath you took, each movement of the body, it brushed along her toe and brought in the scent and feeling of her overworked feet. You weren't even sure what happened, one second you were beneath Aunt Ann's foot, next you were face first with her toe snd your limbs seemed tied up. Ann flexed her toes and chuckled, "Yup I sure did! I wonder if Tommy knows whats going on?" You tried to shake your head to say you didn't but you were lodged against the sweaty flesh too much for any movement, all you could do was wait.

You didn't have to wait long though, Claire eagerly bent over and told you the situation. "She stuck your limbs together and made you her toe ring!"

She described it as one of the most extreme tortures possible....but in a weird way....you didn't seem to mind as much as one would think. Your oldest step sister, Sarah, walks into your room. She is wearing her white running shoes, white socks, shorts and tube top and you figure she is about to go for a jog. Sarah likes to keep in shape and runs a lot, or goes to the gym, and she looks good for it. Her dark hair is pulled up into a pony tail.
'I'm borrowing your I-Pod.' Sarah tells you, walking into your room and taking it from your dresser. You did not want an argument so you said nothing.
'Who was downstairs?' She asks, ever inquisitive.
'It was Anthony.' You reply.
'You dorky friend?' She teases with a smile.
'Yeah.'
'So where is he now?' Sarah asks, flicking through your song collection.
'Mom turned him into an ant and squished him.' You tell her, a hint of sadness evident in your voice. Sarah merely laughs.
'Ha. You don't have a lot of luck keeping friends, do you squirt.' She giggles.
'Not really.' You say.
'In fact.' Sarah says, slipping her socked foot from her sneaker. 'Remember Dave?'

You did remember Dave, he was another of your close friends that Sarah had one day taken as one of her toys a few months ago. You also remember the day it had happened. You and Dave were in your room, on your games console, when Sarah walked in.
'What do you want?' You had asked her.
'I'm bored and i want a new toy.' She had responded, then looked at Dave. 'He'll do.' Dave had no idea what she was talking about.
'Please Sarah, don't.' You had said, hoping to save your friend.
'Shut up twerp.' Was the only reply you got as she walked over to Dave, grinning at him. 'You ready to be my toy, little boy?' She lauged. The next instant he was less than an inch tall, standing between your step sisters flip-flopped feet. You heard the quiet, high pitched squeaks as he began to scream. There was nothing you could do for him. Giggling, Sarah had removed her large foot from her flip flop and brought the pad of her big toe down onto Dave. You saw him vanish benath it as she ground him flat. She then lifted her toe and you could see his body, flat like gum, stuck to her toe. She then nonchalantly put her flip flop back on and walked from the room. That was the last time you had seen Dave.

Now, in your room, you saw a liquid run from your sisters sock, pooling on the floor close to her foot. The liquid then pulled together and began to morph - forming a tiny, inch tall Dave. Sarah then brough her foot down on top of hum, smothering him under the immense, cotton weight.
'He's been a great little foot toy.' She laughed. 'He's been the insole of my shoes, he's been my socks, he's lived under my toe nail. He even spent a day inside my nose.' She then twisted her foot on her tiny prisoner.
'Lucky for him.' You say, wanting your step sister to go away. She enjoyed teasing you like this, she knew you felt bad for your friend and what he was going through.
'You want me to let him go?' She asked, gripping him with her toes, dropping him and smothering him again.
'Yeah.' You say, suprised by the question but feeling it was leading somewhere.
'I'll make you a deal then.' She said, rolling him under her foot. You could hear his tiny cried for help. 'I'll let him go if you take his place for a day.' She snickered.
'What?' You ask, in shock.
'I'll return him to normal and let him go. In return, you have to agree to be my toy for a whole day. And I can do whatever I want with you.'
'Mom would never let you do that.' You say.
'She would if you asked her to lift the ban. Tell her that you want to let me keep you as a toy.'
'What? She'll think I'm weird!' You say, but Sarah shrugs.
'Maybe she will, but thats the deal. If you want to save your friend then this is the only way to do it. I've wanted to have you as a toy for ages, but you always manage to suck up to mom and get out of it.'

You can't believe what she is asking of you. You really want to help your friend out, but to be a toy for Sarah - that scares you. Plus, if you actually told your step mom you wanted to be Sarah's toy for the day, what would she think? What if she thought you liked it? You could very easily end up being a toy a lot more often, even permanently.

'Well tom, whats it to be?' Sarah asks.

Claire sits, gobsmacked and terrified.

info.brief_description: You are Tom, 13, and live with a family of women who can shrink and transform people.
info.description:
*** Loads of views and reviews, which is great - thanks to everyone for that - but not many additions by others (thinks to those that have). If you like this story and want it to grow please take the time to make an addition every now and again. Its not asking a lot and the story would really be better for it. Thanks.****

You are Tom, 13, an orhpan who was adopted by a family of women when you were four years old. You soon discovered the women were not normal however - they have power over other people, able to shrink them to any size or change them into anything they desire. You have seen it first had. Most of the items these women own were once people. Now they are just, shoes, clothes, hankies with human senses, tiny pets: all living a life of torture. The women of the family are:

Cathy: Step Mother (46).
Sara: Oldest Step Sister (28).
Claire: Other Step Sister (21).
Julie: Youngest Step Sister (16).
Ann: Step Aunt (41) - doesn't live with the family but visits regularly.
Carla: Ann's Daughter (17).

Cathy, being the oldest, has power over all other family members. You figure it works that the older the person, the more powerful. So far cathy has a ban on the family using their powers on each other but you know that could change and, as they do bicker from time to time, you would feel sorry for the younger members as they wouldn't stand much chance.
You have seen Cathy to be very strict - punishing her children in rather unusual ways, such as when Sarah was once late home she was turned into a pair of Cathy's dirty white socks and worn for five days straight. Once, when Julie skipped school she was reduced to a speck and lived under a different family members feet each day, ending with her giant aunt Ann, who took great pleasure in keeping her between her smelly toes.

So far you have remained on Cathy's good side, although there have been some close calls. The rest of the family are itching to torment you and you hope that never happens. But you know things can't stay that way forever....

***The story starts in first person perspective (you) but feel free to change if you feel the need for the chapter you add. Just make sure you add a line at the top to say you are switching to third person or whatever. Thanks.***

***For some reason there has been an influx of short, single line chapters recently that don't really go anywhere. They don't add to story so, new rule, no short chapters like that anymore. They will be deleted. As will any chapters that deal with gender swapping - or anything outside of giantess / shrink / feet / transformation (vore and feet related).***

Thanks
